2.0.4: Fix a problem to access to the license informations (error #47 - Maximum redirects followed)
2.0.1: Handle unexpected error 500 but with correct response body
2.0.0: Handle the migration of your old Page Cache Ultimate license to our all-in-one Speed Pack module license
Fix an issue when a clone is detected (choice was not saved)
1.5.1: Translations in french, spanish and polish
1.5.0: Display a notification when a new version is available
1.3.0: Detects when you clone Prestashop to avoid conflict with licenses
1.2.1: Remove the SSL certification check because it often fails
1.2.0: Improve the connection to the JPresta.com server
1.1.0: Improve the error message when the licenses or zip files cannot be downloaded
1.0.6: Fix an issue when Prestashop token is not found
Use the new token key to avoid issue with cloned shops
1.0.5: Increase timeout and use fallbacks for better compatibility
1.0.4: Use Tools::file_get_contents() instead of fopen() for better compatibility
1.0.3: Disable cache clearing when upgrading a module, it is tool long and can be done manually
